com.googlecode.gmail4j
Class GmailConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gmail4j.GmailConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpGmailConnection
public class GmailConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Gmail service connection.

It stores Gmail account Credentials. Can be extended to use certain protocols, proxies, etc.

Since:
0.2
Version:
